content: this legal text summarizes a court case in ragusa italy where a request for personal separation between two spouses was granted the court awarded exclusive custody of the couples minor daughter to the mother and assigned the marital home to her the respondent was ordered to pay a monthly sum of €40000 for the daughters maintenance as well as 50 of any extraordinary expenses additionally the respondent was ordered to pay a compensatory amount of €1000000 along with legal interest and the costs of the litigation the court found that the appellants claim for damages was valid due to the respondents violation of marital duties and awarded compensation for physical and moral damages the court made the final decision in a case registered in 2013 disregarding the objections and separating the spouses the decision was made on october 28 2017 and filed in the clerks office on november 15 2017
